channel.title: Setting up RuneJizz development team
channel.description:
~RuneJizz~
Some of you may have heard of RuneJizz before. We'll i hosted it before and my computer pretty much died so the server went down for a while. I lost my whole development team! But i'm back now and i'm looking for a new one!
________________________________________________________
Spots:
Coder:None
Fourm creator:None
Co Owner:Taken - Mod Pilgrim
Head Admin:None
Admin:None
Mod:None
________________________________________________________________________
Coder info: Interested in Coder spot? Great we're gonna need you. But we need a coder who can code 317-508(required)(525+ would be helpful). I can code some but it's been a while therefore you need to beable to start the server. put the ip in the client etc. I have been having trouble getting the source to be online. So that would be helpful if you could do this(We need coder ASAP)
Fourm creator info: Good at creating forums? Put it to the test. RuneJizz has a forum right now, but its old from before runejizz was shut down the first time. We need you to beable to make a new one(: There isn't too much info for this but it would be nice if you weren't a beginner forum maker. (This is my nice way of saying don't apply if you're somewhat new to it)
Staff spots info: This section is for every staff spot. Head Admin-Mods. Unfourtunatly we won't be needing any staff until runejizz is up and running. You may however go ahead and apply under this section and you will be the first picked if i think you deserve the spot. (Use a NEAT format. If it's not neat i will not read and i will skip-sorry) If you're too lazy to be neat with you're application and make it look nice it's showing me that you are going to be a lazy and not worth staff member. So please try your best
|
|
|
|
|
|
Well this is pretty much all of my post. I might at more later if i don't get applications for spots fast. FIRST COME, FIRST SERVE. So be fast about it guys(: I may be strict about what i'm looking for but if you were in my position trying to make a server that is going to change rsps history, you would too(: haha well thanks, hope to be working with you,
-forrest

item.title: Setting up RuneJizz development team
item.dc:creator: @duces_mane duces mane
item.description:
@duces_mane wrote:

~RuneJizz~

Some of you may have heard of RuneJizz before. We’ll i hosted it before and my computer pretty much died so the server went down for a while. I lost my whole development team! But i’m back now and i’m looking for a new one!

I can code some but it’s been a while therefore you need to beable to start the server. put the ip in the client etc. I have been having trouble getting the source to be online. So that would be helpful if you could do this(We need coder ASAP)

Fourm creator info: Good at creating forums? Put it to the test. RuneJizz has a forum right now, but its old from before runejizz was shut down the first time. We need you to beable to make a new one(: There isn’t too much info for this but it would be nice if you weren’t a beginner forum maker. (This is my nice way of saying don’t apply if you’re somewhat new to it)

Staff spots info: This section is for every staff spot. Head Admin-Mods. Unfourtunatly we won’t be needing any staff until runejizz is up and running. You may however go ahead and apply under this section and you will be the first picked if i think you deserve the spot. (Use a NEAT format. If it’s not neat i will not read and i will skip-sorry) If you’re too lazy to be neat with you’re application and make it look nice it’s showing me that you are going to be a lazy and not worth staff member. So please try your best

|

|

|

Well this is pretty much all of my post. I might at more later if i don’t get applications for spots fast. FIRST COME, FIRST SERVE. So be fast about it guys(: I may be strict about what i’m looking for but if you were in my position trying to make a server that is going to change rsps history, you would too(: haha well thanks, hope to be working with you,

-forrest
